website_summaries.verdict: If you want Bluetooth headphones that produce excellent sound quality, then this is what you're looking for.
pros: High music quality in Bluetooth headphones that fit comfortably, even with glasses
Battery life lasts the advertised 8 hours, and there’s a lifetime warranty
cons: Bulky design makes this the wrong choice for those who wear a helmet or hat
Large, non-adjustable earloops can be unstable during vigorous exercise

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfort at a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I'm no expert on sound quality, just listen to pop music while I'm exercising, but these headphones seem perfectly fine. The volume control is sensitive, the over-ear fit is good (and there were small-enough earpads for me), and they are holding up fine after a few months of use. They seem such a good deal that I've ordered another pair as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: P. Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Warranty with Treblab (what a joke)
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: It had been weeks now without info or repair/replacement. Lifetime Warranty with Treblab on this device and insurance on this device and NOTHING. A waste of money on BOTH because it up and quit and I have reached out and NOTHING. Previous Review: Overall Great Product but all of a Sudden they Quit on Me. How do I go about my insurance on this Item. How do I go about using my Insurancethis for my defective product? That I bought this with Insurance and now the items is no longer working. At first it was skipping in calls. Sounds like cracking and then the left side went out and Just would Not come back on Even after charging completely.
customer_reviews.author: Kinder Customer MB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones! Use ours everyday!
customer_reviews.text: My family and I love tonworkout together and all of us have used a variety of wireless headphones from JBL’s that cost $100, Beats for $200 plus, to completely wireless through amazon at about $60 and all of us love these headphones. The sound quality is amazing. They fit 4 different sized ears amazingly well including a 9 and 14 year olds, they never fall off or slip, even with sweat or water they are amazing! The price is unbelievably reasonable and the variety of colors is great for boys and girls! These are the only headphones we buy now.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this purchase. I have a co-worker that uses these and asked her for the brand because I’ve noticed she wears them all day without needing to charge them. I was overly joyed at the cost. They are comfortable and come in my favorite color, pink!
customer_reviews.author: Loved_Not_Spoiled

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones! Over a year ago I bought a pair for myself for the gym. I originally bought others but they didn’t stay in my ear. So I started searching for ones with a piece that goes behind your ear. I came across these and the reviews were great! They are super comfortable to wear, easy to pair to my iPhone, charge quickly, and are durable. I love these so much that when my husband told me he wanted a pair of headphones for the gym I immediately thought of these and bought them. I highly recommend these headphones!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: earplugs with speakers
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! My husband got these for when he is mowing and running a weed-eater. He tried some others that didn't have foam tips and they did not block out the sound like he was hoping. The foam tips in the Trelab ones make a huge difference! The sound-quality of the speakers is phenomenal as well. He can answer the phone with these without totally disrupting what he is doing. (Obviously he stops the machine, but it's easy to answer without actually handling his phone.) Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Redjess81

customer_reviews.title: Music quality was very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've used these twice during long runs on hot, high humidity days. Music quality was very good for the price, and they never slipped out of my ears during the run. I am accustomed to the running routes I used on both occasions, so I can tell you that areas where my phone would normally buffer (read: not play) the requested track list did not change, nor did it go up....so bad reception areas will still be bad reception areas...but it is not the fault of these phones.
customer_reviews.author: jbeaner

customer_reviews.title: Love the headphones (Tech Support was great!)
customer_reviews.text: March 11, 2019 Update! TREBLAB reads these reviews! Igor from their Product Team reached out to us and fixed our situation. So, we upgraded our review to 5-star. Things happen...Life happens..., but we love good customer service...Thank you Igor and TREBLAB! After less the 2 months with fairly regular use, the ear pads shredded making these headphones almost unusable. Yes ... they came with other pairs of ear pads, but I was not a fan of the other sizes. Sadly, it will cost almost more to replace the ear pads than to buy new headphones. This is very disappointing and discouraging. I would not recommend these headphones to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Looking for help
customer_reviews.text: 1 star is being generous. Purchased these and used them until they stopped pairing. Contacted Product Tech. We tried to fix them, however, they are dead. They offered to replace them if I sent a picture showing them cut up. I am unable to do that. Different accounts and phones. Asked for an address so I could mail them back and getting no cooperation. Sad, considering they're the best buds I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Kitt

customer_reviews.title: TREBLAB XR500 Review
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous at first about purchasing this product. I had a set of bluetooth headphones that had a plastic bracket for the neck strap, but it broke so I had to replace it. I was worried about if they would fit snugly and have any flapping around while moving. The TREBLAB XR500 does not have this. I must say that this product is awesome! The earpieces are sturdy, fit in and around my ears and I am not afraid of breaking it. The flexible wires that connect the earpieces make it easier to move around than my old headset. The battery life, sound quality and quality of materials of this piece are excellent! Just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth cuts out conpletely killing the quality.
customer_reviews.text: There is no way these would ever go for $180 let alone the $50 they are on Amazon. They woek great as long as your phone or bluetooth device is within 1 foot and not obstructed by anything. My pocket is apparently too far away from my ears for the bluetooth to not cut out. Soubd quality is decent and they give you multiple ear adapters so you can decide which is most confortable. Too bad the bluetooth is crap.
customer_reviews.author: Benzgirl

customer_reviews.title: My second pair
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of XR500, the first one having been lost at my local health club . I have a Boze noise cancelling headset but being an older model it isn't Bluetooth. I bought my first set of XR500 for the Bluetooth connectivity. I found the XR500 works perfect when working out at the gym but also on flights when I don't want to take the larger headset with me. My cell phone I keep in my shirt pocket when flying , the XR500 linked to it. I enjoy the deep base sound it has and the easy volume controls on the ear piece. I'm pleased with the product, thus my order for a second set.
customer_reviews.author: MarkB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bargain Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Bluetooth headphones for the price! Have an impressive battery life of around 10-12 hours, connect over Bluetooth without and need for a passcode on my phone, and I've been really impressed with the range! I left my phone on my desk at work and went to the bathroom that was about 35 feet away with a number of walls between and the connection stayed strong. Audio quality is good. Base is ok, but unless you are a big audiophile these headphones will be perfect. The design helps to hold them in your ears, and there's a number of rubber earpieces so you can get the best fit for you. Also comes with a nice compact carrying case as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kpick

customer_reviews.title: quality sound, strong bass response, and excellent product support
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great, and the foam earbud adapters work excellently for passive noise cancelling. I wear them on the metro bus to and from work and cannot hear conversations around me. These have tremendous bass response, so you may have to adjust your EQ depending on the genre of music you listen to. The battery lasts approximately for 8 hours of run time, which gets me through almost a week of commutes and workouts. The foam earbuds deteriorated after a year of constant use, and Productech sent me replacement pieces for free! Great customer service and overall very happy with the product still one year later.
customer_reviews.author: C#Locrian

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these based on decent reviews. The first pair I received work on 1 1/2 trips to the gym and then quit. The company made me cut those in half and sent another pair and second pair works sporadically. Can not figure out what makes them stop working. Battery shows full but will just stop in the middle of a workout. I workout for an hour to an hour and a half so the battery is not being strained at all. These are trash, stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and long lasting battery
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones so much. I use them at work. They last all day and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Best ever for me! I've had no problems!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to the XR500 - after dog got upon the couch then my chair and knocked over things from my table and chewed them up! After studying for quite awhile, and deciding on Treblab, and subsequent my experience with the XR500, I have determined they are the best reasonably priced wireless ear buds that one could obtain. I bragg about them often to others, and explain the many features - note the multi-pairing ability, and versatility between phone calls and smooth automatic transition back-and-forth to music, or any sound involving the phone! I view these earbuds as extremely valuable to me! Thank you very much Treblab!
customer_reviews.author: NwEnglnd Chan

customer_reviews.title: Solid, reliable, easy
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and I have each enjoyed a pair of these headphones for several weeks now and have had only the best experiences with them. We use them while studying, lifting, and running, and have had zero trouble with them. Usually sweating creates an issue with headphones while exercising but not with these. We love their flawless performance and ease of seamless connection to phones and computers.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: These would be better for listening to audiobooks / etc
customer_reviews.text: The headphone audio quality is ok, but the headset microphone picks up a ton of background noise, somewhat improperly distorting my voice if there is road noise. These would be better for listening to audiobooks / etc. than using it to talk while driving, which was the primary intended purpose. They need to work to improve how the headset determines what microphone noise to cancel when there is background noise. My new Platronics Bluetooth headset I received from work does a much better job with this, although it is a one-ear headset (not stereo, as for listening to music)
customer_reviews.author: cmount

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product almost forget it's in my ears, they are exceptionally comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Nunnally

customer_reviews.title: Had to buy because of the new hands-free law in Georgia, I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help with my vagan videos on YouTube. Cherise Livung Life and Cherise Enjoying Life are the YouTube pages. Excellent sound quality, can hear the person I'm talking to very well I actually have to turn it down sometimes as it has that good of quality it's loud. Excellent product to use for listening to music
customer_reviews.author: Cherise Enjoying Life

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, yet GREAT quality
customer_reviews.text: Both my wife and I have a pair and both have good sound quality, fit well and have a battery that lasts a long time. I've had mine for 1 year and, with heavy use, they still last 9ish hours on a charge. If you are looking for truly the best sound quality, this isn't it. It has good bass but the very expensive ones will have a tiny bit better quality. Most people won't be able to tell the difference. It is negligent. Still, these are better than most in sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: They have a great sound, plus the battery life is awesome
customer_reviews.text: These rock! I was tired of hanging myself or having the buds ripped from my ears while using wired ear buds. I use these constantly when working on projects. They have a great sound, plus the battery life is awesome. One suggestion is to tuck the wire under the back strap of a hat or sweatband. I have, on occasion, had the earpieces pull out of my ears when turning or lowering my head. This was attributed to the rear wire "catching" on my neck. Raising it up eliminated that. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: brown61dawg

customer_reviews.title: Ear hooks too soft
customer_reviews.text: I've had them a year. Sound quality is fine but I'm constantly battling to keep the buds in my ears. I've tried the various sizes that come with the device. It makes no difference whether I'm working out with dumbbells or on a ski machine. The problem seems to be that the ear hooks are too soft so they pitch forward and work their way out of my ears. I can't wear the Apple earbuds either for the same reason. Maybe just my ears.
customer_reviews.author: James Preston

customer_reviews.title: Had for about a year now. Still amazing
customer_reviews.text: They're great, my purple is beautiful. They are loud, stay on in the gym, work through water (i've swam with them a few times). Pretty durable.One of the ears had one time snapped apart, but I snapped it back together and its as if it never happened. Comes with many different plug sizes, you can talk on the phone very easily, and switch your music easy as well. I still use about 3-4x/week and during studying. They connect super reliably as well.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good materials, poor sound quality (at least on iPhone 8)
customer_reviews.text: iPhone 8 users: SOUND IS BUGGY That said, I haven't tested with any other device, just my phone. Also, I found it weird that it depends on the app, sound quality varies. If I play the same apps and songs with the iPhone buds, the sound is as good as you can expect from Apple. However, with the XR500 the bass is simply not working, NOISE CANCELLATION IS NOT A REAL FEATURE, and the worst is I found some distortion playing those same songs. I would NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a comfy, secure little package
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these headphones. I don't normally like earbuds because they usually hurt my ears and don't stay in. These are totally different from the usual. They have awesome sound, comfort is definitely there, and they feel very secure. I will most definitely buy these again, when it's time. 😊😍🎧
customer_reviews.author: Saffyre100

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, good fit
customer_reviews.text: Im somewhat of an audiophile and didnt expect much from these headphones. The sound quality surprised me with good bass and treble. My earholes must be weird because in ear phones never fit right so i always get ear hooks. I almost dont need them with these they fit so well (i use the large inserts). The flexibility is also surprising, they feel more durable than my old plantronics set.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Zaucha

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as they used to be!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these and they did not work well. Amazon replaced them and the replacement did not work well either. Ran into various issues with each pair: not pairing, disconnecting when walking 2 feet from the source, volume issues. I used to only purchase these headphones but the quality seems to have gone downhill big time. I would not recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: lisa a gonzales

customer_reviews.title: This was a poor second experience.
customer_reviews.text: I’m mainly giving this 3 stars because of my stellar experience with my previous pair of XR500. However, i just got the new pair a little over a week ago, and i have noticed that the difference in sound quality between my previous pair and the new is astounding. I’m not sure if maybe it was a factory defect, but they sound like the bass part of them is blown out, and they aren’t reaching the highs as easily. They also aren’t nearly as comfortable. I’ve tried reaching out several times, gotten no response yet. I would like to talk with someone if possible to maybe figure out why they are like this.
customer_reviews.author: Ljones

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones ever
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I bought the same headphones about 6 months ago. Unfortunately I got them wet in the port was open so I ruined my headphones. But I bought a new pair and they're even better than the first pair I had. The sound quality is amazing. I don't believe that they say there's sounds resistant. But when I have my headphones and I do not hear anything around me. These are great headphones and for a cheap price. Anytime someone's looking for a headphones I refer them to these headphones 💓😁
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Mid-Bassy!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something secure when I jogged/walked, and these seemed to review well. After living with them for a few days it was clear. These were not for me. I'm a musician, and music was not ideal with these. Bass was very exaggerated and flabby in the mid-bass range. Musical balance wasn't a design consideration, only massive amounts of mid-bass. If you like flabby-bass, these are for you! Telephony was an issue as well. Feedback echo during phone calls were distracting, and sewer-pipe like. Returning these ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Upper Left Coast

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the value
customer_reviews.text: I love these XR500's. They sound pretty decent for the price and fit well. Only reason giving 4*s because I first had the XR 100's . After close to a year they stopped turning on, so I got the XR500 to upgrade for the water resistance they offer and after a few months they got a short in the right ear bud so this is my second pair of 500's and 3rd set from treblab. Hope these last!
customer_reviews.author: garland

customer_reviews.title: Really the best earphones I’ve had in while and I truly have quite a collection
customer_reviews.text: Really blown away by how nice these headphones are. Once they are charged, I can wear them the whole day at work without having to recharge and the sound quality is even better than my pair of Denon for which I paid 3X as much. My only issue would be that the ear hooks are too flexible for my taste...a really petty complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Kojika55

customer_reviews.title: These worked great for about a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because it was on sale that day. They were fine for a cheaper purchase. The microphone for phone calls was a bit lacking. They also balanced really weirdly because of how where the microphone/controls were on the line that tethered them together. I believe when I bought these I paid around $50. For that price they were fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Ian O.

customer_reviews.title: Pros and contras of Treblab
customer_reviews.text: Have heard son many high quality audio and I have to say that this product covers my expectations. I will try to find a flat sound for the equalizer because the sound is to bright for me its not a bad thing is just personal preferences The noise cancellation is just perfect and the are very confortable. The battery life is cool and work as expected. The Bluetooth firm is 4.1 and works just fine. I'm not giving the 5 stars review because it has a very nice sound but for the 5 stars you have to go to the next level and high quality sound is not easy to found. For the price is a excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: FB04

customer_reviews.title: Decent headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got these for running but they will not stay in Update, Customer service reached out to me after my original post and gave me some suggestions on how to better fit ended up using the medium sized foam earpieces and they now day in while running. as far as customer service i wold say 5 star performance just 3 stars as the sound of the earphones in my opinion is OK and would recommend them to anyone that does not want to spend a lot of money for a set of head phones for the gym to get you through the treadmill grind
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Mcallister

customer_reviews.title: Let down
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, but they refuse to stay in my ear. The problem isn't the gel piece that you insert. The loops are WAAAAY to big and offer no support to keep the buds in. I cant run with these in, do boxing, jump rope or any activity where you'll be moving around. I then tried to return the item and amazon doesnt offer me a return label in order to ship it back. all in all i spent 40$ for a piece of junk im stuck with
customer_reviews.author: JakeM52

customer_reviews.title: Died in less than a year of use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in march and they worked great up until a few weeks ago they just stopped working I used them a handful of times but now they are useless. I at least expected to get a year out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Renisha Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for Exercising! Comfortable fit!
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time find earbuds that stay in my ears, especially when I am exercising. These fit snug and wrap around the outside of the ear so they don't come out. They are also very lightweight and comfortable to wear. I lost my first pair and I ordered them again because I like them so much. The only negative is when I reordered them, the one I got didn't work right so I had to return it but they sent me a new one right away.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Dead, would not turn back on after chargin
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I have sent these back I loved these headphones, but... I charged upon receipt, and the batter gave me a good 8 hours of life. Then, it notified me that the battery was about to die, and just as the instructions indicate, I had about 5/10 more minutes left. I plugged in, but the next day - no life - they were dead, and no matter what I did, I was not able to turn them back on. Too bad, because they fit well, and were perfect for my walking.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headphones were great for 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Headphones were great for 2 months, then stopped working. They wouldn’t charge and are completely dead. Just an update: I reached out to Customer service and left a voicemail. Kate called me back the same day and She could not have been more helpful. She sent me an email with some things to try. When that did not work she quickly processed a Replacement. Update: I received the replacement headphones and they are working great. The charge lasts a long time, and they connect very easily. Also, the sound is great. Customer service was exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: TAK

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, will eventually stop connecting
customer_reviews.text: thought it was a good buy initially but the battery life average. sound is ok.not really an upgrade from the previous version Update : if u want and item that will last u awhile this isn't it. I've bought both series and they both stop working in the same way each time. The device will not stay connected especially if I'm moving Even if it is full charged, bought this in January and it stop connecting yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Renee D.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, but lacking in sound quality
customer_reviews.text: They do the job for running in the rain, pretty durable. The sound quality is a bit tingy, lacks base. Update**** So the customer service had called me about 6 months later , which was amazing! They suggested some alterations which I will try at a later time to boost the quality. Not a lot of quality customer service out there like that. So I bumped it to 3 Star, and if the fix works I will put it to a 4!
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: Almost Awesome, but Not Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: This product probably works well for most people, with convenient wireless design, decent-sound quality and several ear-bud sizes; however, its downfall is that the ear-hook piece is not adjustable and thus doesn't stay in place. I'm about 5'2" and petite and I spend 75% of my run readjusting the ear pieces so they don't slip off my ears. By the end of my run I've given up and their dangling around my neck. Although the earbud size selection tempers some of this, that alone is not sufficient to keep these in place. I'd love for them to come out with an adjustable product!
customer_reviews.author: Meg35

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product very happy
customer_reviews.text: I will start by saying these are my first Bluetooth earbuds. Instructions are simple and effective. Was connected and listening to music in less than 30 seconds. Now I must say these are powerful little buds. I can't handle the volume all the way up they get so loud. They also have several different size inserts for your ears. I love the feel of them and the case is really handy for myself as I work outside and can't always have them on. I am very impressed and now it looks as though I might have to get a pair for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Botkins

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive features
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact it’s pink it’s not noise canceling it doesn’t last long and it’s definitely partially waterproof or water resistant I took a shower with it halfway through it got cut off and it wouldn’t turn on for long time then it did thank god otherwise it was waisted headphone I hate it makes a beeping sound it’s irratating when it won’t connect properly
customer_reviews.author: Pinkqueen

customer_reviews.title: Really great earphones
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I have bought, I have other brands but they are no as good as the XR500. I use these at the gym every day to listen to audio books an the quality is great, nice clear voices and they block out most of the outside sound. I will stay with the Treblab brand.
customer_reviews.author: wayne lamica

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: NEVER AGAIN! NO LONGER CONFORTABLE AND ACTUALLY PAINFUL TO WEAR. This is the third time I have gotten the XR500, each time they have lasted a minimum of 2 years, which is pretty good for headphones in general. However, this latest incarnation is not up to par with the previous versions of this model. The new material that the rubber pieces that fit over the ear are now made of are extremely hard, with sharp edges that make wearing them painful. The previous versions were made of a much softer and more flexible material that fit around the ear much better than this new model, without sacrificing their ability to stay on while running.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: A Must-have product
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much. I use them for nearly 10 hours everyday and charge them at night for countless charge/discharge cycles. They are definitely waterproof, durable, and loud and work perfectly when using machinery. Also phone conversations are effortless. I have purchased another pair after losing one set and an additional pair as a backup for a total of three.
customer_reviews.author: GymRatt

customer_reviews.title: On a whim worth it
customer_reviews.text: I got these on a whim as I'm starting to run again and they are certainly worth the money. They haven't fallen out of my ears in 10 miles though I can hear a clicking when the piece connecting the right connector jiggles on my heavy down-steps which is literally my only complaint. The sound quality is great on these as well as battery life and the ability to quickly silence (I run in a neighborhood with kids or other people) with the touch of a button.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon H.

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones for the money
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable to wear, and come with extra ear pieces. They do NOT have a plug in so you will need to use one off your phone, or the USB cable.
customer_reviews.author: pcgirl2003

customer_reviews.title: RUNNING, GYM, FITNESS LIFESTYLE
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Sound quality 👌 CONS: Bought to run and workout in. The cord length was somewhat to big for me even though it doesn't appear to be; at some point kept pulling away the headphone. The hook was a bit big and with the tug of the cord it makes one headphone annoyingly come out to the point i have to keep readjusting in my run. Not very friendly with placing barbells up top etc. Reason I got rid of them: Not sure if its the cord but it has that faulty connection where sound comes on ONE piece unless you find the right spot to move the cord 😑
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone. Okay mic.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and finish.. Though I realized after I purchased them their are many of similar construction just different "Brands" that were about 30% less the cost. Charge quickly and last several hours with loud music. The sound quality is very good and can be very loud if you wish. Virtually not cut out from connection. If you stay around 15 feet from your device you shouldn't have any problems. The Microphone is pretty poor though you have to raise your voice a bit to be heard clearly even in quiet environment.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Jamison

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair and 2nd time disapointed!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, TREBLAB you got me again! However, I'm done with these worthless subpar headphones. The look, feel, and functionality is good. However, don't expect them to last more than 6 months! The first pair lasted 6 months; I stupidly bought a second pair that only lasted 4 months! So disappointing! You've been warned!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Headphones
customer_reviews.text: The headphones work very well and I was enjoying the audio production well into about 3 weeks of usage when the left ear piece broke separating the driver from the rest of the unit. I contacted TREBLAB and after a couple of emails--proof of purchase, pics, etc.--they send me a brand new set. Now it's all Kool
customer_reviews.author: Franco Nero

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've ever worn. I've gone through so many! Worth every penny!!!! You won't be disappointed!! The ear pieces are a little squishy like ear plugs so they stay in really well. Not having to constantly adjust, they stay where I want them to!!
customer_reviews.author: Terri bishop

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these for my husband and I. We use them for work and could not like them more, they fit so snugly, they are easy to pair, and have the most amazing sound I've ever heard from an earbud. The bass is especially impressive. I am really impressed with the quality of the product and the customer service I received. They come with their own carrying case and are comfortable for all day wear. We could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Loo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Better Company.
customer_reviews.text: I run around 10 miles a week and I've been a loyal Treblab customer for around 2-3 years. First off, for running these are the greatest. They stay hooked around your ears, the Bluetooth is powerful & stays connected, and they're pretty good about rejecting sweat. #2 My previous pair started to fade and had some weird technical issues. I told Treblab, and all they asked me to do was cut the wire, take a picture, and they sent me a brand new pair. I'll be buying Treblab's for my next pair of athletic bluetooth earbuds, and the next after that. Thanks guys for great service, and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Laux

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE HEADPHONES
customer_reviews.text: Just got these in today and they’re the WORST headphones I’ve ever had. I’m not sure if mine are defective, or the other customers just haven’t experience quality headphones..but these things suck. The bass is HORRIBLE. When hard bass parts of the song are played, it sounds like the headphone’s speakers are busted. Returning ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: brantley

customer_reviews.title: Great workout earbuds at a price
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of workout bluetooth earbuds and it was better than I expected. Pairs automatically with my phone, battery lasts long, and fits snuggly in my ear. Had a problem with it first when the left earbud stopped working within a few months, but after 15 minutes with customer support, I ended up with a brand new headset in the mail. Recently, I've been having a small problem with the rubber ear inserts breaking and falling off, but they provide plenty of backups that I can easily swap out with. Overall great product that I would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value & Outstanding Quality Bluetooth Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality, long battery life and so comfortable your forget you are wearing them. My favorite choice now to wear for yardwork - protects my hearing like ear-plugs, super-comfortable/don't fall out even when I'm sweating in 100 deg.s of heat and can listen to my favorite music in hi-def. as well!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. Porges

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great Headphones for the price. I was pleasantly surprised with these when I received them. They have good bass, are loud, and quickly connect to my phone (Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge) when I turn them on. They are not as good at staying in your ears while running as the bigger more rigid (behind the neck type) headphones, but overall do an OK job. If I wanted big headphones, then I would have bought big headphones. The microphone can sometimes pickup a lot of wind noise, but usually does a good job in indoor environments.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for the price. They are perfect for the gym and do a great job of canceling the other noises in the gym. I only charge the batteries once a week and have had this product for over a year now. These headphones work pretty well for phone calls, although I do not use them much for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work weel and sound fine.
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good. They come with a number of pairs of ear pieces for a good fit. The sound quality is quite good. As soon as I charged them up and tried to pair them with my iphone 5s they worked like a charm. The second time I must have spent 20 minutes but they finally paired and since, I have had no problem. I ti nice to both cut the cord and have some good sounding buds.
customer_reviews.author: Old Tim

customer_reviews.title: My Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I say my earbuds because this is the only brand of earbuds I will ever buy. Other earbuds pop out of my ears, thest are comfortable, over the ear, does not pinch, and I feel like I am right in the middle of the concert. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: CDTM Housden

customer_reviews.title: Finally a headset that really does what it says it does
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it states, when it says it will not come out of your ear or break the seal in your ear, it is correct. I have purchased many, and they all say the same thing and may be nice, but they all fall short when it comes to staying in your ear. This product does what it says, I charged it put it on as instructed and went for a run and was sweating and the headset never came off, the earbuds never came out or even broke the seal of my ear. Anyway, it is an attractive set with user friendly controls, but staying in the ear - yes, they do just as they say.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Powell

customer_reviews.title: I've had the Treblab XR500 for 10 months now. ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Treblab XR500 for 10 months now. I bought them thinking that a Bluetooth headset would be less prone to wire fatigue/breakage, which is how most of my wired headphones end up. Unfortunately they haven't held up quite as well as I'd hoped. The wire connecting the right and left earpiece started failing at the junction with the right earpiece after about 6 months. Now I've only got sound out of the right earpiece. I'll be looking for something with a little more robust connection between the earpiece and wire, or a truly wireless device next time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased around 12 sets, I have 3 for me & have gifted 3 sets & the other 6 sets I have sold to co-workers as they also have loved the sound, ease of pairing & the maintenance (NONE) of them.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE NEGRON

customer_reviews.title: Good on sound and comfort, a lil stronger bluetooth power
customer_reviews.text: Loud work good , i use on mower all day, only real issue i have is it doesn't reach well enough to my bluetooth as id like. If im mowing it usually doesn't cut out. If im weedeating with phone in my pocket, it cuts out.needs a lil more compatibility with bluetooth on reach to fix that issue. Other than that no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for durable, reasonably priced Bluetooth headphones when exercising and these have surpassed my expectations. The sound is amazing. The bass resonates but isn't overwhelming and the music is clear. The over-ear hook design is comfortable and secure. I wear them with my glasses without issue. The ear buds actually stay in place, are fantastic when it comes to noise canceling ability and it only takes an hour or 2 to charge for up to 9 hours of music. Treblab sends two separates sets of ear bud covers along with a convenient carrying case so they'll fit most people's ears. An all around great product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY! Perfect for any outside laborer or fitness freak!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very hesitant about buying Bluetooth headphones after MULTIPLE problems with my lg tone headphones while I use them landscaping. I read the reviews, and the fact that they were related so highly from so many people & being waterproof, I made the purchase. I'd buy 4 of these instead of lg tones any day! These things run circles around those. I love them! When I need replacements after wearing out or breaking I'll buy again! I LOVE THESE. GO BUY THEM NOW!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ATLReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Holds a charge for a long time. Very comfortable. Pretty darn good noise cancelling for ear buds (which is not a feature I was really after). Great sound quality (nice rich bass). For what you pay you get a great quality product.
customer_reviews.author: cris

customer_reviews.title: great all around product
customer_reviews.text: great product have owned a few of treblab products i have used this for just about evrrything listening to music movies on airplane bluetooth on phone has worked awesome for it all highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality & battery life
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones. They were easy to connect to my phone, and I can go a week without charging them (so long as I properly turn them off when I’m done using them. Yes - you have to turn them off. It will say “power off, your headset is disconnected” to confirm you’ve powered off to save battery.) I’ve heard that the battery life will die out on these in a year or so, but that’s how batteries work - they die eventually. For what I paid, these are better than expected. Different size ear pieces also make these versatile, I can jump, run, kick ect and these stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlynn Moran

customer_reviews.title: As good as the hundred buck ones.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a snotty audiophile. I'v run through several dozen headsets over the years. For the price they are hard to beat. Ok, maybe for $200 but, seriously. The second best thing is that they actually stay on when you are running!!
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: A great set for the money.
customer_reviews.text: For what these are, these headphones are really great. The playback time lasts a long time. The range of these headphones, paired with a Galaxy S5, is actually greater than what is described. I use these for homework and for listening to music while working in the shop. I do like these a lot. My only complaint is that they do not fit my ears very well, I do wish that the silicone ear loops came in different sizes. Other than that, they sound great and work very well.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous earbuds with excellent sound and long lasting life when charged. These are sufficiently waterproof that I can swim or do water exercises in them. The Bluetooth range is great, making them perfect for working around the house or garden.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: I Love these headphone and recommend them to everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I obought the treb lab 500s about 3 years ago on a lightening deal. My pair is still working like new, battery life is awesome, sound is dynamic and the best decision I ever made. I have since "sold" everyone in my family on them, they have purchased and love as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: christina edwards

customer_reviews.title: The headphones fit very comfortably and the sound is great
customer_reviews.text: The headphones fit very comfortably and the sound is great! They're easy to use and the bluetooth connection is quality. Unfortunately, due to their shape they produce a loud whistling/whooshing sound if using them outside when there is any wind or while running. For inside use, they're great. But being marketed as sweat-proof, sport headphone I would expect the design to be able to stand up to moving air while running and using outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy These.  You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, these rock. They Sound nearly identical to the Beats 3.0 wireless. The sound is good, but not 100% to my taste. They have VERY good deep bass, and clear mid-range, but the highs are lacking and gives kind of a muddy sound. Still, for working out they stay in my ear great weather I am hitting the weights or going for a run. The battery has lasted every bit of 2 hours solid, which is really all I need them for as I use for my workouts. No issues with bluetooth connectivity as I have seen with other wireless earbuds. I can definitely recommend these, will update on durability.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Great product. Great sound. Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Product is very good as good as the power beats3. Battery life has lasted long time using it at a moderate volume. Great clearing external noise, dont hear almost anything, great fit! Surround sound quality. It does power off automatically after disconnecting from the BT. Material is good, no complaints, the cable is probably not as good as the power powerbeats but besides that the only difference is the logo. For the price, it is the best you can get. The best audio earphones for running they don't move and can't even feel they are there. Would recommend someone to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Juan S.

customer_reviews.title: Had these for almost a year (literally in 30 minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: Had these for almost a year (literally in 30 minutes, it'll be a year). Have no complaints about these. They fit well, have ran approx. 1,000 miles and cycled over 7,500 miles with them, with ABSOLUTELY NO PROBLEM!!. Actually anticipated ordering another pair for a long bike ride this upcoming year, where I know I'll out ride the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Jester

customer_reviews.title: good but with some quirks
customer_reviews.text: The level of bass changes depending on how I'm holding my head while at the gym, the reason I got Bluetooth ear phones. If my face is facing down, the base level is rich and full, but If my face is facing upwards, the bass dramatically drops off. I have the most correct ear buds attached - they come with three sizes. Also, please note that the black ear foams dampen the over all sound of the device and I recommend not using them for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Z

customer_reviews.title: Washing machine vs headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these headphones. I wear them running and when mowing the grass. Battery life is great and they handle my sweat great. I'm actually writing this review due to accidentally putting them to a harder test though. After a workout I put them in my pocket... Then the shorts went through the wash. I really thought that they were ruined. I let them dry for 24 hours. Turned them on. They still work perfectly. They seriously went through my washing machine and still work. My next set when I finally put accidentally kill these will be another set from this same page.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Better than beats
customer_reviews.text: Best of these I've had so far. It actually talks and says "power on" "power off" "connected" "disconnected" and tells you who's calling when you have an incoming number. Calls work great.
customer_reviews.author: Self Help Guru

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not write reviews but today i was sitting at work listening music in my ears with these Headphones which i bought a little over a year ago and they sounded so good that i decided to appreciate and write a review where its due. Very satisfied with them being over a year old and i used them on and off but still running strong...(Fingers Crossed)
customer_reviews.author: TradersInc

customer_reviews.title: They sound good and work fine, but there is a rattle coming from the right earbud when not wearing them.
customer_reviews.text: Day One Review - When I unboxed them I noticed a rattle coming from the right earbud and was concerned that it might be broken. But regardless I paired them up and gave them a listen, both sides work fine and the sound quality is great for $30 Bluetooth earbuds, and the rattle isn't noticeable when I am wearing them but if you move them while not wearing them you can definitely hear it rattle. I would say it is worth the $30, the only issue so far is the audible rattle coming from the right side that isn't noticeable when wearing the earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle S.

customer_reviews.title: Wireless earbuds that dont fall out of your ears
customer_reviews.text: After using 6 different wireless headphone and earbud products I have found my perfect pair. These have been with me on countless runs and trips to the gym without fail. Never have I had a problem with them falling out of my ears or falling off altogether. I had a pair of Beats that were similar but constantly had connectivity issues which I haven't had with these. Once connected these stay paired with my phone until I turn them off. These by far are the best solution for wirelessly enjoying music or podcasts while staying active.
customer_reviews.author: TT3015

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Good sound. Great sound for a $30 earbud. The subtle earbud connector and hooks are great for not losing or dropping a bud and does not stand out too much or is too big. Great for playing basketball or any sport in and you will not lose them like you would a pod. Only one small complaint: a bit too basey if and only if you screw the buds a little too far into your ear. Avoid this buy simply just sliding them right on, maybe a bit snuggly and you will get a surprisingly good sound quality...Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but max 10 feet transmission.
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable ear buds with great sound. Unfortunately, their range is more like 10 feet than 33 feet. I was hoping to use them while relaxing in my pool, but I can't get further than 10 - 15 feet away without losing the signal. If there's some trick to getting better distance, I'd love to know it given all of the paid endorsements. Even if all devices are fully charged, no luck. I'm settling for using them with my iPad in my purse, but these are expensive given they don't live up to the promise.
customer_reviews.author: mosaicmuse

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these headphones for less than a week and they work perfectly. They fit well on my ear, saw from previous comments it was an issue but I haven’t had that problem. I go to the gym frequently and do a lot of high intensity workouts and they do not fall off. All in all I do like these headsets and hopefully this can help anyone wanting to buy a pair of Bluetooth headsets that stay in place while working out.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Serious battery life, stay in place
customer_reviews.text: I like these headphones. The battery lasts a long time; they are not picky about the microUSB charging cable used and they stay on my ears nicely. The water resistance is a nice feature in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Harlow

customer_reviews.title: Horrible connectivity issues with bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality and battery life are great. The problem I have with this product is that the bluetooth connectivity is terrible. I will have my phone in my pocket and it loses connection defeating the whole purpose of having wireless earbuds. I previously owned a different model of Treblab's ear buds and they were great until my daughter sent them for a spin through the washing machine. I very disappointed in this model. Total waste of money unless you're ok with constantly holding your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: so far these are the best. Really great sound
customer_reviews.text: i've been through a lot of blue tooth ear buds, so far these are the best. Really great sound, incredibley comfortable: I was hesitant about the ear wrap-arounds but they are so soft that they do not cause any irritation at all - can hardly feel them. So far I've been able to go three 1.5 hour workouts without charging (I'll charge them tonight). Will update if my experience over time changes this review. But so far, the best I've tried, especially for the Less-than-$50-price.
customer_reviews.author: Griz

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones at their price point.
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly I was hesitant at first to get these based on such a low price point. But I have to say I am thoroughly impressed with them. They sound great and I really like the fact you can see the battery level in the notification bar next to the Bluetooth icon. Used them for an hour or two last night around the house. Amazing noise cancellation. Also took them for a run this morning, worked flawlessly. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a solid set of Bluetooth ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ross

customer_reviews.title: Good for music not so much for calls
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife as xmas present. Half of the reason was for her to use for phone calls but the sound quality is pretty bad for the person on the other end. She sounds muffled and its difficult to understand half of what she says. UPDATE ***** Treblab customer service reached out to me and made my experience a whole lot better by offering a new free pair of earphones better suited for phone calls. They shipped them super fast and the entire team was continuously offering updates on its arrival. Shout out to Dennis and Marina for providing excellent customer service. I will be recommending Treblab for now on.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Easily Broken/Not charging
customer_reviews.text: As you can see I've purchased these three times and about to make another purchase. Why because of price and my husband likes the sounds BUT they are easily to be broken so we're going to try it again. This time they just stopped charging. After writing this review the Seller responded right away and gave a full refund on replaced earbuds. Again, my husband love the buds. Thank you Again for the outstanding Customer Service ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.author: Sherri P.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the product which is a very comfortable wear. But, I wished I had known there was a newer model out there prior to purchasing TREBLAB XR500. Had I known that, I would have preferred to purchase the newer model TREBLAB XR800 which was at the same price...
customer_reviews.author: Leon R. Bee

customer_reviews.title: These headphone are great! They stay in place and are relatively loud
customer_reviews.text: These headphone are great! They stay in place and are relatively loud. The only downside is if I wanted to listen to music at work, I would like to only put one earpiece in but there was no hook to attach to my shirt so it would CONSTANTLY fall out from the weight. It lasts for at least 3 hours, and I haven't used it longer than that so it could probably last longer. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Torres

product_meta.title: TREBLAB XR500 - Ultimate Cordless Bluetooth Running Headphones. Best Sport Wireless Earbuds for Gym. Noise Canceling Secure-Fit IPX7 Wireless Waterproof Headphones Mic. Workout Earphones 2019 Upgrade
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

TREBLABis one of the brands of Productech Corp., located in Miami, FL, USA. The mission of the brand is to offer cutting-edge, ergonomic personal audio gear that embodies full convenience of Bluetooth technology, comfort, and affordability. Each TREBLAB product is manufactured with precision and care, and every detail is designed for maximum enjoyment. Join us in hacking through the hype and experience the pure sound of TREBLAB.


Meet TREBLAB XR500 - Bluetooth Headphones, Running or Gym Workout that make you feel good! 

THE WAY YOU EXPERIENCE SOUND IN RUNNING EARPHONES IS ABOUT TO CHANGE FOREVER!

TREBLAB XR500 – A TESTAMENT OF TECHNOLOGY AND AUDIO ENGINEERING

When you put on TREBLAB’s workout earbuds, your ears will be treated to true HD sound, an unparalleled bass response, and serene noise cancelling – all with seamless wireless Bluetooth connectivity. 

FEATURES
- HIGH-DEFINITION SOUND – Rock-solid bass, super-crisp treble in cordless headphones.
- PASSIVE NOISE CANCELLATION – with ear-tips.
- SECURE COMFORT FIT – Soft rubber finish and secure hooks.
- LONGEST PLAY TIME – Up to an incredible 9 HOURS of play.
- CONTROL CALLS – HD Microphone, volume, skip, pause and play.
- COMPATIBLE WITH – All devices with bluetooth.

Amazon Buyers Trust TREBLAB to be a Brand that is Focused on High-Quality Products and Great Customer Service

You are Backed by Our 1 Year Manufacturer’s Warranty too!

We Cannot Guarantee this Special Pricing, So Be Sure to Click Buy Now!
feature_bullets: TRUE HD SOUND AND HIGH OUTPUT SPEAKERS – Our best sport wireless earbuds; latest Bluetooth 4.1 EDR technology with CD-like sound quality. Enjoy crisp treble and strong bass in the gym or on the go and feel the added motivation and improved results.

ULTIMATE HEADPHONES FOR SPORTS - eXtra comfortable, ipx7 bluetooth headphones - never fall off, thanks to XDrop ear-hooks. Whether you’re a serious runner or just love hitting the gym from time to time, your search for the best wireless WATERPROOF headphones and SWEAT-PROOF cordless earbuds is over!

BLOCKS OUT THE NOISE - our passive noise-cancelling earbuds come with expandable foam ear-tips that block outside noise and let you to focus. LONGEST BATTERY in wireless workout earphones - Keep on running with music or talking on the phone without a recharge for up to 8 hours!

ENHANCED CONNECTIVITY AND PAIRING - Pair bluetooth running headphones to an iPhone, iPad or Android device easily in literally 5 seconds. CALLS MANAGEMENT - Just touch a button when someone’s calling, and to hang up.
Make everything you do more fun with XR500 Bluetooth earphones! For California Residents Only: Warning - Cancer and Reproductive Harm – P65Warnings ca gov

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars5,052 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
